original_text: The king was overjoyed and gave orders to lift Daniel out of the den. And when Daniel was lifted from the den, no wound was found on him, because he had trusted in his God.
korean_text: 왕이 심히 기뻐서 명하여 다니엘을 굴에서 올리라 하매 그들이 다니엘을 굴에서 올린즉 그의 몸이 조금도 상하지 아니하였으니 이는 그가 자기의 하나님을 믿음이었더라

sentences.original_text: and gave orders to lift Daniel out of the den
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다니엘을 굴에서 끌어 올리라는 명령을 내렸다

sentences.original_text: And when Daniel was lifted from the den
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다니엘이 굴에서 끌어 올려졌을 때

sentences.original_text: no wound was found on him
because he had trusted in his God
